ing: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped
1/3 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean SprayÂ® CraisinsÂ®)
n: The Talk of the Potluck Kale and Apple Salad
des:
"A favorite for potlucks, family gatherings, and hot summer nights at home.
 With a food processor to chop the kale, I can be done and out the door to a party within 25 minutes - and that includes 5 minutes to find my keys. 
My kids love this salad when I add lots of apples!"
ins: Massage salt into kale in a large bowl until kale is slightly softened, about 2 minutes. Gently stir apples, olive oil, cranberries, sunflower seeds, and vinegar into kale until salad is evenly mixed. Gently fold Gorgonzola cheese into salad.
